channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 0d7aedc0-15fd-4a67-a412-efad370c947e
Display name: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Azure Files Storage Operator Role
Description: Enables permissions to set OpenShift cluster-wide storage defaults. It ensures a default storageclass exists for clusters. It also installs Container Storage Interface (CSI) drivers which enable your cluster to use Azure Files.
Link: https://management.azure.com/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/0d7aedc0-15fd-4a67-a412-efad370c947e?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: a1f96423-95ce-4224-ab27-4e3dc72facd4
Display name: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Cloud Controller Manager Role
Description: Enables permissions for the operator to manage and update the cloud controller managers deployed on top of OpenShift.
Link: https://management.azure.com/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/a1f96423-95ce-4224-ab27-4e3dc72facd4?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 0336e1d3-7a87-462b-b6db-342b63f7802c
Display name: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Cluster Ingress Operator Role
Description: Enables permissions for the operator to configure and manage the OpenShift router.
Link: https://management.azure.com/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/0336e1d3-7a87-462b-b6db-342b63f7802c?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 8b32b316-c2f5-4ddf-b05b-83dacd2d08b5
Display name: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Image Registry Operator Role
Description: Enables permissions for the operator to manage a singleton instance of the OpenShift image registry. It manages all configuration of the registry, including creating storage.
Link: https://management.azure.com/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/8b32b316-c2f5-4ddf-b05b-83dacd2d08b5?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 0358943c-7e01-48ba-8889-02cc51d78637
Display name: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Machine API Operator Role
Description: Enables permissions for the operator to manage the lifecycle of specific purpose custom resource definitions (CRD), controllers, and RBAC objects that extend the Kubernetes API. This declares the desired state of machines in a cluster.
Link: https://management.azure.com/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/0358943c-7e01-48ba-8889-02cc51d78637?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: be7a6435-15ae-4171-8f30-4a343eff9e8f
Display name: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Network Operator Role
Description: Enables permissions to install and upgrade the networking components on an OpenShift cluster.
Link: https://management.azure.com/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/be7a6435-15ae-4171-8f30-4a343eff9e8f?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 5b7237c5-45e1-49d6-bc18-a1f62f400748
Display name: Azure Red Hat OpenShift Storage Operator Role
Description: Enables permissions to set OpenShift cluster-wide storage defaults. It ensures a default storageclass exists for clusters. It also installs Container Storage Interface (CSI) drivers which enable your cluster to use various storage backends.
Link: https://management.azure.com/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/5b7237c5-45e1-49d6-bc18-a1f62f400748?api-version=2022-04-01
